Description:
Plan layout and installation of electrical wiring, equipment and fixtures, based on job specifications and local codes.
Review all electrical equipment in the plant, report any issues found, and generate alerts for abnormalities.
Verify that all electrical components and equipment in the facility are in good working order, reporting any problems observed and generating notifications to address them as necessary.
Based on job specifications and local codes, lay out and install electrical wiring, equipment, and fixtures.Skills
Skills:
Time management.
Physical aptitude.
Physical skills.
Problem-solving skills.
